form.official-title: To amend the Communications Act of 1934 to classify broadband as telecommunications service.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Net Neutrality and Broadband Justice Act of 2022.

section.header: Classification of broadband as telecommunications service
section.text: Section 3(53) of the Communications Act of 1934 (47 U.S.C. 153(53)) is amended—

paragraph.text: by striking means the offering and inserting the following: “—
by striking the period at the end and inserting the following: “; and

subparagraph.text: includes the offering of broadband internet access service, as defined in section 801, for a fee directly to the public, or to such classes of users as to be effectively available directly to the public, regardless of the facilities used.
